      • setBRJS

        public void setBRJS(BRJS brjs)
        Description copied from interface: Plugin
        Invoked after construction, and before any non-identifier methods have been invoked, so plug-ins have a reference to the BladeRunnerJS model.
        Parameters:
        brjs - The reference to the BladeRunnerJS model.

      • getRequestPrefix

        public java.lang.String getRequestPrefix()
        Description copied from interface: ContentPlugin
        Returns the prefix that all requests for this content plug-in will begin with.

        Note: Developers should not rely on any class initialization performed within Plugin.setBRJS() as this method is an identifier-method which may be invoked before Plugin.setBRJS() has itself been invoked.

      • getCompositeGroupName

        public java.lang.String getCompositeGroupName()
        Description copied from interface: ContentPlugin
        Returns the group name of content plug-in, which allow composite content plug-ins that compose a number of related plug-ins.

        Note: Developers should not rely on any class initialization performed within Plugin.setBRJS() as this method is an identifier-method which may be invoked before Plugin.setBRJS() has itself been invoked.

        Returns:
        the group name if one exists, or null otherwise.

      • getContentPathParser

        public ContentPathParser getContentPathParser()
        Description copied from interface: ContentPlugin
        Returns the content-path parser that will be used to parse all requests for this plug-in.

        Although the parsing mechanism used by content plug-ins could be an internal implementation detail within each class, by exposing it we make it possible to create requests for external content plug-ins that are less brittle to change.

      • getValidContentPaths

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getValidContentPaths(BundleSet bundleSet,
                                                             RequestMode requestMode,
                                                             Locale... locales)
                                                      throws ContentProcessingException
        Description copied from interface: ContentPlugin
        Returns the list of valid content paths for the given bundle-set and locale.
        Parameters:
        bundleSet - The bundle-set for which content paths must be generated.
        requestMode - An enum representing the 'mode' for this request - either dev or prod.
        locales - The locale for which content paths must be generated.
        Throws:
        ContentProcessingException - if a problem is encountered.

      • handleRequest

        public ResponseContent handleRequest(ParsedContentPath contentPath,
                                     BundleSet bundleSet,
                                     UrlContentAccessor contentAccessor,
                                     java.lang.String version)
                              throws ContentProcessingException
        Description copied from interface: ContentPlugin
        Get a reader for the content generated for the given request.
        Parameters:
        contentPath - The parsed content path created using the content path parser available from ContentPlugin.getContentPathParser().
        bundleSet - The bundle-set for the bundlable node to which this request is related to.
        contentAccessor - The output stream the content will be written to.
        version - TODO
        Throws:
        ContentProcessingException - if a problem is encountered.
